trans-unit.source: Cancel the template deployment of resources.
trans-unit.target: Cancel the template deployment of resources.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="953bb73d-e38c-4c29-bd35-1b2d5b37c5ce#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to template deployments.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="953bb73d-e38c-4c29-bd35-1b2d5b37c5ce#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to template deployments.

trans-unit.source: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group in which the resources are being deployed.
trans-unit.target: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group in which the resources are being deployed.

trans-unit.source: Replace {deployment-name} with the name of the deployment to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Replace {deployment-name} with the name of the deployment to cancel.

trans-unit.source: The deployment of resources using a template can only be canceled if the provisioningState of the template deployment is <languageKeyword>Accepted</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Running</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The deployment of resources using a template can only be canceled if the provisioningState of the template deployment is <languageKeyword>Accepted</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Running</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: After the deployment is canceled, the provisioningState is set to <languageKeyword>Canceled</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: After the deployment is canceled, the provisioningState is set to <languageKeyword>Canceled</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Canceling a template deployment stops the currently running template deployment and leaves the resource group partially deployed.
trans-unit.target: Canceling a template deployment stops the currently running template deployment and leaves the resource group partially deployed.
